EmailTemplate.subject: Your reward for completing Turbonomic's 2018 Community Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for completing our 2018 Community Survey, your feedback is greatly appreciated! As a reward for your time, here's your $10.00 Amazon.com gift card. Please follow the link below to claim this offer.
If you'd like to learn how Turbonomic enables workloads to be SMART, to self-manage, anywhere, in real-time to simultaneouslyÂ optimize performance, cost, and compliance in real-time, watch this video <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/the-smart-workload-v3]]>.
{{my.Gift 10:default=edit me}}
Regards, Team Turbonomic
